agent_response: Ruby: Absolutely! I’ve just locked in your appointment for **[Day], [Date] at [Time]** and added it to your Elyx calendar. If anything changes or you need to reschedule, just let me know—I'm here to keep everything running smoothly. Looking forward to it!
